title: Provides that tenants of manufactured homes shall receive rent reductions equal to the tax reduction attributable to a tax exemption
summary: Provides that tenants of manufactured homes shall receive rent reductions equal to the tax reduction attributable to a tax exemption; modifies criteria for the STAR exemption; updates terminology, changing "trailer or mobile" to "manufactured" home.
